benchmark_details.name: IndicSQuAD
benchmark_details.overview: IndicSQuAD is a comprehensive multi-lingual extractive QA dataset covering nine major Indic languages, systematically derived from the SQuAD dataset, aimed to improve question-answering systems for low-resource Indic languages.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a large-scale, high-quality findable question-answering dataset for Indic languages to facilitate the development of robust and inclusive NLP applications.

data.source: Systematically translated and adapted from the SQuAD dataset.
data.size: 118,516 training samples, 11,873 validation samples, 11,803 test samples for each language.
data.annotation: Translated with linguistic fidelity and answer-span alignment techniques applied.

methods: Evaluation using baseline performance metrics on QA tasks
Comparison of monolingual and multilingual models
methodology.calculation: Performance metrics calculated based on the predictions of the models against the ground truth in the dataset.
methodology.interpretation: Higher EM and F1 scores indicate better performance in extracting answer spans accurately.
methodology.baseline_results: EM scores for models vary; for example, HindiRoBERTa achieved EM of 56.20%.
